place.name: LLAN SOE
place.gazetteerText: LLANSOY, a parish in Chepstow district, Monmouth; 2 miles NE of Llandenny r. station, and 4½ ENE of Usk. Post town, Usk, under Newport, Monmouth. Acres, 1,410. Real property, £1,687. Pop., 168. Houses, 30. The property is divided among a few. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Llandaff. Value, £170.* Patron, the Duke of Beaufort. The church is good. Charities, £14. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
